phrases: Just a little farther till we are at Kame House.
T- that is the direction we just came from.
No, it does not appear to be a star...
There is a tremendous Ki rising up.
Father's Ki has not risen again, right?
This nasty feeling is coming from the other one's Ki.
And you know, that is an incredible amount of Ki.
You mean to where Goku is?
He is going to die if this keeps up...
What are you talking about, Gohan?
There is no way Goku- your father is going to die, is there?
Besides, even if we go back there,
we cannot do anything against a guy with a Ki that incredible.
I absolutely have to go back there!
Let me give you some good news.
A Saiyan who has become a Great Ape has ten times more battle power!
Goku, there is a great ape monster that comes out during the full moon.
As long as you stay asleep, you will be safe.
I- I will make it so that tail of yours never grows back.
It is something of a nuisance.
The monster that crushed Grandpa to death...
l'll probably have to use up all of my Ki, or I will not be able to beat him.
Once I die, and go back over to the Next World, l'll go apologize to you.
That monster's clothes're the same as the Saiyan's!
I am going to feed you your fill of me and the earth's Genki Dama!
You are at last going to use the Genki Dama, are you?
Still, with your body as ragged as it is,
this is going to put too much of a burden on it.
I am starting to see some light.
You mean the Saiyan has transformed, even without the moon!?
There is no way he can stand up to that monster!
Why are not you helping Son- kun!?
Goku, he is your son, all right.
H- he is so fast for as big as he is!
I do not have enough time to mentally focus so I can create a Genki Dama!
And even if I went to a 5X Kaio-ken, it would not be any use against him!
If you are not going to come at me, then I am coming after you!
I- I just need ten seconds!
I need some time to concentrate!
Tenshinhan, I am going to borrow your technique!
Now, while his eyes are blinded by the glare!
Each of you, share with me just a little bit of your Genki energy!
Dammit, that was an insolent stunt!
Just a little more, and I can form a Genki Dama...
He is starting to get his sight back.
l'll be able to launch the Genki Dama before he can attack.
It is useless to run away from me!
l've gathered the Genki energy together.
Please, let there be enough time!
I have collected the Genki energy from all earthlings.
I- I never expected him to attack like that...
T- that was an awful miscalculation.
The Genki Dama I worked so hard to make has vanished...
Hmph, you are a tough bastard.
But you appear to be near your limit.
There are not no way even I can win now.
I used up most of my Ki on that Genki Dama.
Now what are you going to do!?
Looks like I carelessly stepped on you and crushed your leg.
Well, this time, I will carelessly crush your heart.
This is the end for you, Kakarrot!
Even if you were to come back to life again, this planet will not be here when you do!
D- damn... I am utterly defeated...
I never imagined there would be this much difference in our power...
I am glad there was someone so strong... but if I die...
That is what you call the weasel's last fart...
Now, I are not even got enough strength left to blow my nose...
How dare you... how dare you scar my face!?
I am going to squeeze you to death!
Having been wounded, Vegeta was burning with anger.
Will Goku be crushed to death like this?
